ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.edge

Class GravisEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.AbstractEditItemObservable
      • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.AbstractGraphItem
        • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.edge.GravisEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEdge, IRestrictedEdge, IEditItemObservable, IGraphItem, IRestrictedGraphItem

     class GravisEdge
extends AbstractGraphItem
implements IEdge
    This implementation of the IEdge interface gives access to mutable edge methods.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(double weight)
        Description copied from interface: IEdge
        Sets the weight of this edge. An edit event of type IEditGraphEventListener.Type.EDITED is fired if weight is different from the existing value.
        Specified by:
        setWeight in interface IEdge
